pyqgis_plugin.name: automate
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plug-in QGIS per progetti di infrastrutture gas [TEMPLATE PERSONALIZZATO]
pyqgis_plugin.about:
The AUTOMATE plugin for QGIS v2 is a comprehensive, modular toolkit for GIS-based gas infrastructure project design according to TENG specifications (Italgas Reti S.p.a.).
ðŸš€ VERSION 2 FEATURES: â€¢ Complete modular architecture for enhanced maintainability â€¢ Professional code organization with functional separation â€¢ Improved performance and reliability
ðŸ”§ CORE FUNCTIONALITIES: â€¢ RG_COD Management: Manual generation and automated calculation with on/off toggle switch â€¢ PhotoEditor Integration: Advanced photo management with Google Street View API and custom editor â€¢ Attachment Management: Complete file handling system with trash management â€¢ Quality Control: Comprehensive project validation with custom reporting â€¢ Project Packaging: Automated zip creation for project submission â€¢ Configuration Management: Advanced settings and preferences system
ðŸ—ï¸ MODULAR ARCHITECTURE: â€¢ tools/rg_cod/: RG code generation system with automation control â€¢ tools/photo/: Photo management and editing capabilities â€¢ tools/attachments/: File attachment and deletion system â€¢ tools/controller/: Quality assurance and validation tools â€¢ tools/settings/: Configuration dialogs and preferences â€¢ tools/zip/: Project compression and progress tracking â€¢ core/: Shared utilities and configuration management â€¢ database/: Centralized database connectivity and models
The plugin seamlessly integrates into QGIS interface with a dedicated toolbar for efficient workflow management.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: python, gas infrastructure, project design, automation, photo management, quality control, modular architecture, italgas
